APS_BindConf_t Struct Reference

Parameters structure of the APS_BindConf() function. ZigBee spec r17: Table 2.7, page 36: The APSME-BIND.confirm primitive. This primitive allows the next higher layer to be notified of the results of its request to bind two devices together, or to bind a device to a group. More...

#include <aps.h>


Data Fields

APS_Status_t status

Detailed Description

Parameters structure of the APS_BindConf() function. ZigBee spec r17: Table 2.7, page 36: The APSME-BIND.confirm primitive. This primitive allows the next higher layer to be notified of the results of its request to bind two devices together, or to bind a device to a group.

Definition at line 505 of file aps.h.

Field Documentation

APS_Status_t APS_BindConf_t::status

The results of the binding request.
